Control Name: Information Access Management  Access Establishment and Modification - 164.308(a)(4)(ii)(C)
Control Statement: Implement policies and procedures that, based upon the covered entity\u0080\u0099s or the business associate\u0080\u0099s access authorization policies, establish, document, review, and modify a user\u0080\u0099s right of access to a workstation, transaction, program, or process.
